page.title: 03Education.The Old School.
page.content: Mrs Cocker and Mr Eady 2 old scholars remember the Old school now a community centre in Head Lane as being divided into Junior\Infant sections.There were 150 children and 5 staff.Your teacher taught you all subjects. The subjects included English arithmatic and nature study with a little history and geography.Good writing using a pen and ink was sressed.Juniors wrote on slates.There were separate boys\girls playgrounds. You read silently if your teacher was not present.You were caned if you did wrong.Boys wore caps and short trousers. There were no school dinners but a hot drink was provided. Empire,Sports and Ascension Days were special events as was the annual Flower Show.Toilets were outside and rooms were dark with high ceilings and windows.School lasted from 9 to 4. You learnt poems by heart
